Source.Name: blosc
Source.Summary: A blocking, shuffling and loss-less compression library that can be faster than `memcpy()`
Source.Description: Blosc is a high performance compressor optimized for binary data. It has been designed to transmit data to the processor cache faster than the traditional, non-compressed, direct memory fetch approach via a memcpy() OS call.

Package.Name: blosc
Package.Summary: A blocking, shuffling and loss-less compression library that can be faster than `memcpy()`
Package.Description: Blosc is a high performance compressor optimized for binary data. It has been designed to transmit data to the processor cache faster than the traditional, non-compressed, direct memory fetch approach via a memcpy() OS call.
